boardgame.name: Pergamon
boardgame.description: Pergamon is a tactical collecting game with a theme based on excavating archaeological discoveries and managing their exhibition._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Set in the year 1878, the first excavations in what is now modern Turkey are uncovering the remains of ancient Pergamon. Soon the precious discoveries will make their way abroad to public exhibitions before a waiting audience, eliciting substantial honor and glory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The players attempt to gain federal research grants to cover the costs of their excavations through a bidding mechanism. Whoever is modest and less demanding can travel to the excavating areas before his or her competitors, and the rule is first come, first dig. Only fragments will remain for the later expeditions. Recovered treasures are placed in valuable exhibitions, for which the discoverer receives glory and recognition._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The player who accumulates the most glory after 12 rounds wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The combination of soliciting funds and racing for the best locations to excavate makes Pergamon a variable game with rules that are easily accessible. Players are forced to make choices based on the money they can obtain and the sequence in which they choose where to dig._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: BGTG 120 - Favorites of 2011 (A Few Acres of Snow, Pergamon)
Exploring Games, Episode 10: Unpub Mini and More Reviews!

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Eggert Spiele Edition

Gryphon Games (GRY 101281N) It‘s the year 1878. At the first excavations in today‘s Turkey, archaeologists discover remains of ancient Pergamon. Soon the finds make up precious exhibitions that intrigue the public. The players attempt to receive ample parts of the federal research funds to cover the expenses of their excavations. If you are modest and do not demand too much, you will be able to go to the excavation sites before your competitors. That can be crucial, because: first come, first dig! The last ones, however, may only get a few leftovers. The unearthed treasures can be joined together to form valuable exhibitions and yield the finder plenty of fame and appreciation. The clever combination of obtaining funds and racing for the best excavation spots turns Pergamon into a diversified game with easily accessible rules.
From an auction for kdean1 only.

The players attempt to receive ample parts of the federal research funds to cover the expenses of their excavations. If you are modest and do not demand too much, you will be able to go to the excavation sites before your competitors. That can be crucial, because: first come, first dig! The last ones, however, may only get a few leftovers. The unearthed treasures can be joined together to form valuable exhibitions and yield the finder plenty of fame and appreciation. The clever combination of obtaining funds and racing for the best excavation spots turns Pergamon into a diversified game with easily accessible rules.
